projects.title: Multi Modal Listing (MML)
projects.description: Led development of an AI-enhanced product listing feature in Android using server-based and on-device AI models. Reduced listing time and improved seller acquisition.

projects.title: Android App Modernization at VMware
projects.description: Refactored large Java codebases to Kotlin, introduced Room DB, improved test coverage and CI/CD pipelines, and enforced architectural best practices.

patents.title: Reserving physical resources based upon a physical identifier

certifications_or_extras.education: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication, PESIT, VTU
journals_or_publications: Bottom Navigation and Navigation Drawer Using Scaffold from Jetpack Compose

questions.question: Describe your experience developing RESTful APIs using Django and DRF.
How do you optimize database queries in Django applications?
Explain your approach to implementing authentication and authorization in a Django application.
How do you ensure the quality of your code through testing?
Explain your experience with Celery and message queues. Can you give an example of a use case?
Describe a time you faced a performance bottleneck in a backend system. How did you diagnose and resolve it?
Explain the difference between authorization and authentication.
